鶽字的基本解释

鶽
sǔn
古同“隼”。

鶽
xùn
飞。

鶽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǔn］
［《廣韻》思尹切，上準，心。］
亦作“鶽1”。
(1)鸟名。又名鹘。鹰类中最小者，飞速善袭。猎者多饲之，使助捕鸟兔。
(2)通“準”。鼻。

鶽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶽； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1497第02
【玉篇】思尹切，音笋。祝鳩也。急疾之鳥也。本作隼。【說文】隼，鷙鳥也。【陸璣曰】齊人謂之擊征。或謂之題肩。或謂之雀鷹。春化布穀者也。【山海經】開明南有鶽。【註】雕也。

鶽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
鶽字的起名意思

暂无。

鶽
Basic explanation of words
鶽
sǔn
Ancient with the "Falcon".
鶽
xùn
fly.
鶽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǔn]
["Guangyun" Si Yinqie, quasi, heart. ]
Also known as "鶽1".
(1) The name of the bird. Also known as falcon. The smallest of the eagles, attack quickly. Hunters feed more to help catch birds and rabbits.
(2) Pass "quasi". nose.
鶽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶽; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1497 No. 02
[Jade articles] Si Yin cut, sound shoots. I wish Hao too. The bird is also in a hurry. This is a falcon. [Said the text] Falcon, bird of prey also. [Lu Ji said] Qi people called the attacking levy. Or called the title shoulder. Or called the Sparrowhawk. Vernalization cuckoos are also. [Shan Hai Jing] Enlightened in the south, there is 鶽. [Note] Carving too.
